condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Advocacy / CommunicationUNICEF staff and partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders

description.narrative: In 2019, Communication and Advocacy work of UNICEF DRC focused on Emergencies and other critical health related issues: (i) UNICEF's response to the Ebola outbreaks; (ii) Measles epidemic; (iii) malnutrition. Global attention focused on Ebola during the UNICEF Executive Director's visit, which generated extensive media coverage by national and international news outlets on UNICEF's Ebola response. More than 95,000,000 people were reached through this collaboration. In addition, 19,997,678 people were reached via the CO social media platforms. 2,176,084 acts of engagement were made on UNICEF's digital platforms and there are over 711,500 followers/subscribers to the office online platforms. | Status:Met | As-of Date:05/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of communication organizations supported.[Nombre d'organisations appuyes.]
Number of digital engagement (blog + Social media). [Nombre d'engagement digital (blog + Social medias)]

Number of people reached by the media (press articles, TV and radio reports, radio and TV ads), communication publications (brochures, posters, etc.), and the digital communication work of UNICEF DRC and its partners.[Nombre de personnes atteintes par les supports (article de presse, reportage tlvis et radio, spots radio et tl et publications (brochure, affiche etc.) de communication et le travail de communication digitale d'UNICEF RDC et ses partenaires.]

% of government, donors, and technical partners with a positive assessment of UNICEF DRC.[% des partenaires gouvernementaux, financiers (bailleurs) et techniques ayant une apprciation positive de l'UNICEF/RDC.]

Number of communication products on the situation of children in the DRC published and disseminated as a result of UNICEF / DRC communication activities (including ponabana publications) [Nombre de produits de communication sur la situation de l'Enfant en RDC publis et diffuss rsultant d'activits de communication d'UNICEF/RDC (y compris les publications de ponabana)]

Number of people reached by the communication activities (events) and digital communication work of UNICEF DRC and its partners.[Nombre de personnes atteintes par les activits (vnements) de communication et le travail de communication digitale d'UNICEF RDC et ses partenaires.]
